channel.title: Scalable Oversight on Serhat Giydiren

item.title: AI Safety Diary: September 20, 2025
item.description: A diary entry on Chapter 8 of the AI Safety Atlas, focusing on the challenge of scalable oversight and how to effectively supervise AI systems that may become more intelligent than humans.
